Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It told me what I got wrong in particular when at times grading just says what I need to work on in general.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback felt less personal, and I could choose not to listen to it if I wanted. Teacher feedback feels more impactful and important.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher feedback can identify mistakes in reference format or structure relating to the assessment's criteria, GenAI can only give feedback based on general rules of thumb.
